subject: Football
Drownings
Death and Dying
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Four days before the Packers face the Giants in an N.F.C. divisional playoff game, the players and the coaches were thinking of offensive coordinator Joe Philbin, whose son drowned this week.
snippet: Four days before the Packers face the Giants in an N.F.C. divisional playoff game, the players and the coaches were thinking of offensive coordinator Joe Philbin, whose son drowned this week.
